file-upload.description: Send local file with an HTTP POST request. Run an HTTP service on the attacker box to collect the file. Note that the file will be sent as-is, instruct the service to not URL-decode the body. Omit the '@' to send hard-coded data.

file-download.description: Fetch a remote file via HTTP GET request.

file-read.description: The file path must be absolute.

suid.description: Fetch a remote file via HTTP GET request.

sudo.description: Fetch a remote file via HTTP GET request.
